description: Dentistry blends science and art to improve smiles and lives. It’s a career of precision, care, and personal impact—making people healthier and more confident every day.
long_description: Dr. Alex Thompson has over 15 years of experience in restorative dentistry. He is known for his gentle approach, attention to detail, and dedication to continuing education.
short_description: Expert in restorative and cosmetic dentistry with 15+ years of experience.

description: Choosing dentistry means choosing to heal, to create confidence, and to build long-term patient relationships while combining medical skill with hands-on creativity.
long_description: Dr. Lisa Carter specializes in pediatric dentistry. Her friendly nature and playful clinic environment help children feel safe and relaxed during treatment.
short_description: Pediatric dentist making kids smile with care and compassion.
